app.team21.risk.elements

Interface PlayerStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggressiveBot, BenevolentBot, CheaterBot, RandomBot

    public interface PlayerStrategy
    Last Updated on: 29/11/2018, Thursday This is an interface of player's attack,reinforcement,fortify method.
    Version:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Yash Sheth

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        void attack(java.lang.String country1,
            java.lang.String country2,
            GameScreen game_view,
            Player current_player,
            MapElements map_elements)
        Attack Method for the player. Based on Player type , attack method will be executed according in respective java class..
        Parameters:
        country1 - Country from where you want to attack
        country2 - Enemy Country
        game_view - current GameScreen Object
        current_player - object of Player class
        map_elements - map elements

      • fortify

        void fortify(java.lang.String country1,
             java.lang.String country2,
             GameScreen game_view,
             Player current_player,
             MapElements map_elements)
        Fortify Method for the player. Based on Player type , fortify method will be executed according in respective java class.
        Parameters:
        country1 - country from where you want to move army
        country2 - country where you want to move army
        game_view - current GameScreen Object
        current_player - object of Player class
        map_elements - map elements

      • reinforce

        void reinforce(java.lang.String country,
               GameScreen game_view,
               Player current_player,
               MapElements map_elements)
        Reinforce Method for the player. Based on Player type , Reinforce method will be executed according in respective java class.
        Parameters:
        country - country where you want to reinforce Army
        game_view - current GameScreen Object
        current_player - object of Player class
        map_elements - map elements
